value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Aaand that's really all there is to tell
you about the castle. If you have any
other questions, don't be shy!$k$p$WmMPID_ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Normal,Face|If something comes up, we will know
where to turn. Thank you for giving
up your time for us.$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|Thank you... Very much.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, it's no problem at all! I'm just
happy to have some more new faces.
I'm sure we'll speak again soon.$k$p$WmMPID_ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Normal,Face|What an honor that the Princess of
Askr offered up her time to give us a
tour of the castle.$k$p$WmMPID_ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Normal,Face|Yes. These people certainly seem
much more hospitable than those of
most other beorc countries.$k$p$WmMPID_ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Normal,Face|It's odd—I already feel comfortable
here, somehow.$k$pI never expected to witness Heroes
from entirely different worlds joining
together like this. It's wonderful.$k$pAnd being surrounded by so many
Heroes... I want to fight them all to
put my skills to the test!$k$p$WmMPID_リュシオン,ch11_07_Rieusion_M_Normal,Face|Hm...$k$p$WmMPID_ティバーン,ch11_05_Tibarn_M_Normal,Face|Why so grim, Reyson? Is something
the matter?$k$p$WmMPID_リュシオン,ch11_07_Rieusion_M_Normal,Face|No, it's nothing.$k$p$WmMPID_ニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Normal,Face|Well, shall we head out, King Tibarn?
Seems like it is about time we show
everyone here how we laguz fight.$k$p
